    <dd>ACTIVE</dd><dt>Inactive</dt>
    <dd>INACTIVE</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language python %}}
<dl class="tabular"><dt>ACTIVE</dt>
    <dd>ACTIVE</dd><dt>INACTIVE</dt>
    <dd>INACTIVE</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
